title: Entity Signal - Real Time Entity Framework (EF) and ASP.NET core
content:
What is Entity Signal?

Entity Signal allows you to connect to Entity Framework through SignalR and get updates on subscribed data in real time. This lowers the number of refreshes done by the user and ultimately allows you to do more with fewer servers. It is also requires minimal changes, so you can make realtime apps about as easily as you can make standard apps.

Make all of your data real time. Recieve updates no matter where the object was created or edited! Uses existing ASP.NET core permissions system.

Source: entitysignal.com/
